mapper.insert: INSERT INTO activityNews ( news_title,users_name, users_id,news_view, news_praise,news_comment, news_date,news_award, createdUser, createdTime, modifiedUser, modifiedTime ) VALUE ( #{news_title}, #{users_name}, #{users_id}, #{news_view}, #{news_praise}, #{news_comment}, #{news_date}, #{news_award}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE activityNews SET news_title=#{news_title},users_name=#{users_name}, users_id=#{users_id}, news_view=#{news_view}, news_praise=#{news_praise}, news_comment=#{news_comment},news_date=#{news_date}, news_award=#{news_award}, modifiedUser=#{modifiedUser},modifiedTime=#{modifiedTime} WHERE anid=#{anid}
